explains: adj. 无道德原则的，肆无忌惮的

sentences.en: These kids are being exploited by very unscrupulous people.
sentences.cn: 这些孩子正被极不道德的人利用。

sentences.en: The new law will be a charter for unscrupulous financial advisers.
sentences.cn: 新的法律会使不诚实的金融顾问有机可乘。

sentences.en: When he is without virtue, man is the most unscrupulous and savage of the animals.
sentences.cn: 一旦失去美德，人就是最不讲道德、最为凶残的野兽。
